name: GetOrganizationInvitations
description:
Retrieve invitations sent to organization members.

Use this tool to obtain a list of invitations that have been sent to the members of an organization. It retrieves all organization member invitations.

parameters.name: organization_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization whose member invitations you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: number_of_rows_to_return
parameters.description: Specifies the number of invitation rows to return.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token to retrieve the next or previous set of organization invitation results.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specify field name and sort direction (asc or desc). Use a comma-separated list for multiple fields.

value_schema.description: Order results by the field name and direction specified (ascending or descending). Returns multiple sets of results in a comma-separated list.

parameters.name: filter_by_email
parameters.description: Filter results by a specific email address. Provide the email to narrow down the invitations.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: filter_by_status
parameters.description: Filter results by invitation status: "pending", "accepted", or "declined".

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by status  ("pending", "accepted", or "declined")

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order results by the field name and direction specified (ascending or descending). Returns multiple sets of results in a comma-separated list.

value_schema.description: Order results by the field name and direction specified (ascending or descending). Returns multiple sets of results in a comma-separated list.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by status  ("pending", "accepted", or "declined")

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by status  ("pending", "accepted", or "declined")

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
